creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
markings: 三世彫栄; 電浪二九四
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: In a True Account by Telegram from the Russo-Japanese War, Engine and Carriages of the Train running over Frozen Lake Baikal, Russia, Sinks in the Water, Killing Scores of Officers and Soldiers Instantly. Russia’s Transport Capacity is Severely Damaged
